몬스터(Intro-A)

MONSTERS (INTRO-A)

각 항목 읽기

READING THE ENTRIES

Each monster 묘사 is organized in the same general format, as outlined below.

수치 표

STATISTICS BLOCK

This portion of a monster 묘사 contains basic game information on the creature.

이름

Name

This is 이름 by which the creature is generally known. 설명 문구 may provide other 이름.

크기와 유형

Size and Type

This line describes the creature의 size. A size 수정치 applies to the creature의 방어도(AC) and 공격 보너스, as well as to certain 스킬. A creature의 size also determines how far it can reach to make a melee 공격 and how much space it occupies in a fight (see 공간범위/도달범위, below).

크기와 유형 line continues with the creature의 type. Type determines how magic affects a creature. Type determines certain features, such as 히트 다이스 size, 기본 공격 보너스, base 내성 굴림 보너스, and skill points.

히트 다이스

Hit Dice

This line gives the creature의 number and type of 히트 다이스, and lists any 보너스 히트 포인트. A parenthetical note gives the average 히트 포인트 for a creature of the indicated number of 히트 다이스. A creature의 히트 다이스 total is also treated as its 레벨 for determining how 주문 affect the creature, its rate of natural 치료, and its maximum ranks in a skill.

선제권

Initiative

This line gives the creature의 수정치 on 선제권 checks.

속도

Speed

This line gives the creature의 tactical 속도 on land (the amount of distance it can 엄폐 in one 이동 action). If the creature wears 갑옷 that reduces its 속도, the creature의 기본 육상 속도 follows.

If the creature has other modes of 이동, these are given after (or in place of) the land 속도. Unless noted otherwise, modes of 이동 are natural (not magical).

방어도

Armor Class

방어도 line gives the creature의 AC for normal 전투 and includes a parenthetical mention of the 수정치 contributing to it (usually size, 민첩, and 자연 갑옷). The creature의 touch and flat-footed ACs follow 전투-준비 AC.

A creature의 갑옷 proficiencies (if it has any) depend on its type, but in general a creature is automatically proficient with any kind of 갑옷 it is described as wearing (경량, 일반, 중량), and with all lighter kinds of 갑옷.

기본 공격/드잡이

Base Attack/Grapple

The number before the slash on this line is the creature의 기본 공격 보너스(before any 수정치 are applied). This number won’t often be used, but it can be handy sometimes, especially if the creature has 강한 공격 or 전투 숙련 특기.

The number after the slash is the creature의 드잡이 보너스, which is used when the creature makes a 드잡이 공격 or when someone tries to 드잡이 the creature. 드잡이 보너스 includes all 수정치 that apply to the creature의 드잡이 checks (기본 공격 보너스, 근력 수정치, special size 수정치, and any other applicable 수정치, such as a racial 보너스 on 드잡이 checks).

공격

Attack

This line shows the single 공격 the creature makes with an 공격 action. In most cases, this is also the 공격 the creature uses when making an 공격 of opportunity as well. 공격 line provides the weapon used (natural or manufactured), 공격 보너스, and form of 공격(melee or ranged). 공격 보너스 given includes modifications for size and 근력(for melee 공격) or 민첩(for ranged 공격). A creature with 무기 기교 feat can use its 민첩 수정치 on melee 공격. If the creature uses natural 공격, the natural weapon given here is the creature의 primary natural weapon. If the creature has several different 무기 at its disposal, the alternatives are shown, with each different 공격 separated by the word “or.” A creature can use one of its secondary natural 무기 when making an 공격 action, but if it does it takes an 공격 페널티, as noted in 전력 공격 section below. 피해 that each 공격 deals is noted parenthetically. 피해 from an 공격 is always at least 1 point, even if a subtraction from a die roll reduces the result to 0 or lower.

전력 공격

Full Attack

This line shows all the physical 공격 the creature makes when it uses a full-round action to make a 전력 공격. It gives the number of 공격 along with the weapon, 공격 보너스, and form of 공격(melee or ranged). The first entry is for the creature의 primary weapon, with an 공격 보너스 including modifications for size and 근력(for melee 공격) or 민첩(for ranged 공격). A creature with 무기 기교 feat can use its 민첩 수정치 on melee 공격. The remaining 무기 are secondary, and 공격 with them are made with a –5 페널티 to 명중 굴림, no matter how many there are. Creatures with 다중공격 feat take only a –2 페널티 on secondary 공격. 피해 that each 공격 deals is noted parenthetically. 피해 from an 공격 is always at least 1 point, even if a subtraction from a die roll reduces the result to 0 or lower.

A creature의 primary 공격 피해 includes its full 근력 수정치 (1-1/2 times its 근력 보너스 if 공격 is with the creature의 sole natural weapon) and is given first. Secondary 공격 add only 1/2 the creature의 근력 보너스 and are given second in the parentheses.

If any 공격 also have some special effect other than 피해, that information is given here.

Unless noted otherwise, creatures using natural 무기 deal double 피해 on critical hits.

Manufactured 무기: Creatures that use swords, bows, 창, and the like follow the same rules as characters do. 보너스 for 공격 with 양손 무기 is 1-1/2 times the creature의 근력 수정치 (if it is 보너스), and is given first. Offhand 무기 add only 1/2 근력 보너스 and are given second in the parentheses.

공간범위/도달범위

Space/Reach

This line describes how much space the creature takes up on the battle grid and thereby needs to fight effectively, as well as how close it has to be to threaten an opponent. The number before the slash is the creature의 space, or how many feet one side of the creature occupies. The number after the slash is the creature의 natural reach. If the creature has exceptional reach due to a weapon, tentacle, or the like, the extended reach and its source are noted in parentheses at the end of the line.

특수 능력과 특성

Special Attacks and Special Qualities

Many creatures have unusual 능력. A monster entry breaks these 능력 into 특수 능력과 특성. The latter category includes defenses, vulnerabilities, and other 특수 능력 that are not modes of 공격. A special ability is either extraordinary (Ex), 유사주문 (Sp), or supernatural (Su). Additional information (when needed) is provided in the creature의 설명 문구.

When a special ability allows a 내성 굴림, the kind of save and the save DC is noted in 설명 문구. Most 내성 굴림 against 특수 능력 have DCs calculated as follows: 10 + 1/2 the attacker의 racial 히트 다이스 + the relevant 능력 수정치.

The save DC is given in the creature의 묘사 along with the ability on which the DC is based.

내성 굴림

Saves

This line gives the creature의 Fortitude, Reflex, and Will save 수정치.

능력

Abilities

This line lists the creature의 능력 점수, in the customary order: Str, Dex, Con, Int, Wis, Cha. Except where noted otherwise, each creature is assumed to have the standard array of 능력 점수 before racial adjustments (all 11s and 10s). To determine any creature의 racial ability adjustments, subtract 10 from any even-numbered ability score and subtract 11 from any odd-numbered score. (Exceptions are noted in the 전투 section of a creature의 설명 문구.)

근력: Quadrupeds can carry heavier loads than bipeds can. Any creature with four or more motive limbs can carry a load as a quadruped, even if it does not necessarily use all the limbs at once.

지능: A creature can 말하기 all the languages mentioned in its 묘사, plus one additional language per point of 지능 보너스. Any creature with an 지능 score of 3 or higher understands at least one language (Common, unless noted otherwise).

Nonabilities: Some creatures lack certain 능력 점수. These creatures do not have an ability score of 0—they lack the ability altogether. The 수정치 for a nonability is +0.

스킬

Skills

This line gives the creature의 스킬, along with each skill의 수정치 (including adjustments for 능력 점수, 갑옷 판정 페널티, and any 보너스 from 특기 or racial traits). All listed 스킬 are 직업 스킬, unless the creature has a character class (noted in the entry). A creature의 type and 지능 score determine the number of skill points it has.

스킬 section of the creature의 묘사 recaps racial 보너스 and other adjustments to skill 수정치 for the sake of clarity; these 보너스 should not be added to the listed skill 수정치.

An asterisk (*) beside the relevant score and in 스킬 section of 설명 문구 indicates a conditional adjustment, one that applies only in certain situations.

Natural Tendencies: Some creatures simply aren’t made for certain types of physical activity. If it seems clear that a particular creature simply is not made for a particular physical activity, that creature takes a –8 페널티 on 스킬 판정 that defy its natural tendencies.

In extreme circumstances the creature fails the check automatically.

특기

Feats

The line gives the creature의 특기. A monster gains 특기 just as a character does. Sometimes a creature has one or more 보너스 특기, marked with a superscript B (B). Creatures often do not have 전제조건 for 보너스 특기. If this is so, the creature can still use the feat. If you 소원 to customize the creature with new 특기, you can reassign its other 특기, but not its 보너스 특기. A creature cannot have a feat that is not 보너스 특기 unless it has the feat의 전제조건.

환경

Environment

This line gives a type of climate and terrain where the creature is typically found. This describes a tendency, but is not exclusionary.

집단

Organization

This line describes the kinds of groups the creature might form. A 거리 of numbers in parentheses indicates how many 전투-준비 adults are in each type of group. Many groups also have a number of noncombatants, expressed as a percentage of the fighting population. Noncombatants can include young, the infirm, slaves, or other individuals who are not inclined to fight. If 집단 line contains the term “domesticated,” the creature is generally found only in the company of other creatures, whom it serves in some capacity.

도전 지수

Challenge Rating

This shows the average 레벨 of a party of adventurers for which one creature would make an encounter of moderate difficulty.

전리품

Treasure

This line reflects how much wealth the creature owns. In most cases, a creature keeps valuables in its home or lair and has no 전리품 with it when it travels. Intelligent creatures that own useful, portable 전리품(such as 마법 아이템) tend to carry and use these, leaving bulky items at home.

성향

Alignment

This line gives 성향 that the creature is most likely to have. Every entry includes a qualifier that indicates how broadly that 성향 applies to the species as a whole.

성장

Advancement

The monster entry usually describes only the most commonly encountered version of a creature. 성장 line shows how tough a creature can get, in terms of extra 히트 다이스. (This is not an absolute limit, but exceptions are extremely rare.) Often, intelligent creatures advance by gaining a 레벨 in a character class instead of just gaining a new Hit Die.

레벨 보정

Level Adjustment

This line is included in the entries of creatures suitable for use as player characters or as cohorts (usually creatures with 지능 scores of at least 3 and possessing opposable thumbs). Add this number to the creature의 total 히트 다이스, including 직업 레벨, to get the creature의 effective character 레벨(ECL). A character의 ECL affects the experience the character earns, the amount of experience the character must have before gaining a new 레벨, and the character의 starting 장비.

아볼레스 is a revolting fishlike amphibian found primarily in subterranean lakes and rivers. An 아볼레스 has a pink belly. Four pulsating blueblack orifices line the bottom of its body and secrete gray slime that smells like rancid 기름칠. It uses its tail for propulsion in the water and drags itself along with its tentacles on land. An 아볼레스 weighs about 6,500 pounds.

아볼레스 말하기 their own language, as well as 지하공용어 and Aquan.

전투

COMBAT

An 아볼레스 공격 by flailing with its long, slimy tentacles, though it prefers to fight from a distance using its 환영술 powers.

노예화(Su): Three times per day, an 아볼레스 can attempt to 노예화 any one living creature within 30 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Will save or be affected as though by a 인간형 지배 spell (시전자 레벨 16th). An enslaved creature obeys 아볼레스의 telepathic 명령 until freed by 저주 제거, and can attempt a new Will save every 24 hours to break free. The control is also broken if 아볼레스 dies or travels more than 1 mile from its slave. The save DC is 매력-based.

사이오닉(Sp): At will—최면의 무늬 (DC 15), 환영의 벽 (DC 17), 신기루 비전술 (DC 18), 지속적인 환영 (DC 18), 조건적으로 발동하는 환영 (DC 19), 환영 투사 (DC 20), 가리개 (DC 19). Effective 시전자 레벨 16th. The save DCs are 매력-based.

Slime (Ex): A blow from an 아볼레스의 tentacle can cause a terrible affliction. A creature hit by a tentacle must succeed on a DC 19 Fortitude save or begin to transform over the next 1d4+1 minutes, the skin gradually becoming a clear, slimy membrane. An afflicted creature must remain moistened with cool, fresh water or take 1d12 points of 피해 every 10 minutes. The slime reduces the creature의 자연 갑옷 보너스 by 1 (but never to less than 0). The save DC is 건강-based.

A 질병 제거 spell cast before 변형 is complete will restore an afflicted creature to normal. Afterward, however, only a 치료 or 광역 치료 spell can reverse the affliction.

Mucus Cloud (Ex): An 아볼레스 underwater surrounds itself with a viscous cloud of mucus roughly 1 foot thick. Any creature coming into contact with and inhaling this substance must succeed on a DC 19 Fortitude save or lose the ability to breathe air for the next 3 hours. An affected creature suffocates in 2d6 minutes if removed from the water. Renewed contact with the mucus cloud and failing another Fortitude save continues the effect for another 3 hours. The save DC is 건강-based.

스킬: An 아볼레스 has a +8 racial 보너스 on any 수영 check to 공연 some special action or avoid a hazard. It can always choose to take 10 on a 수영 check, even if distracted or endangered. It can use 달리기 action while swimming, provided it 수영 in a straight line.

아볼레스 마법사

ABOLETH MAGE

전투

COMBAT

The save DC for 아볼레스 마법사의 변형 tentacle 공격(DC 21) and its mucus cloud (DC 21) are adjusted for its higher 건강 score. The save DC for its 노예화 ability (DC 16) is adjusted for its lower 매력 score, as are the save DCs for its psionic 능력: 최면의 무늬 (DC 14), 환영의 벽 (DC 16), 신기루 비전술 (DC 17), 지속적인 환영 (DC 17), 조건적으로 발동하는 환영 (DC 18), 환영 투사 (DC 19), 가리개 (DC 18). Effective 시전자 레벨 16th.

아볼레스 마법사 uses a number of 주문, such as 변위, 상급 투명화, and 힘의 장벽, to protect itself while seizing control of its foes with 주문 and innate 능력.

Typical 마법사 주문 Prepared (4/6/5/4/4/3; save DC 15 + spell 레벨): 0—강타, 마법 감지 (2), 저항; 1st—알람, 인간형 매혹, 다색 분사, 마법사의 갑옷, 마법 화살 (2); 2nd—흐릿함, 황소의 근력, 암흑, 여우의 교활함, see invisibilty; 3rd—마법 무효화, 변위,비행, 번개 화살; 4th—상급 투명화, 환상의 암살자, 염탐, 돌피부; 5th—몬스터 포박, empowered 번개 화살, 힘의 장벽.

아체라이 are massive, 15-foot-tall flightless birds that inhabit lawful 이세계 of battle and are only occasionally encountered elsewhere.

아체라이은 infernal을(를) 말할 수 있습니다. They weigh about 750 pounds.

전투

COMBAT

In close 전투, an 아체라이 lashes out with two of its four legs and snaps with its powerful beak. It makes frequent use of its 탄성 공격 feat to strike quickly and then retreat out of 거리 before an enemy can counterattack.

An 아체라이의 natural 무기, as well as any 무기 it wields, are treated as evil-aligned and lawfulaligned for 목적 of overcoming 피해 축소.

Black Cloud (Ex): Up to three times per day an 아체라이 can release a choking, toxic black cloud.

Those other than 아체라이 within 10 feet instantly take 2d6 points of 피해. They must also succeed on a DC 15 Fortitude save or be affected for 3 hours as though by an 광기 spell (시전자 레벨 16th). The save DC is 건강-based.

These small vines bear clusters of leaves, and in late summer they produce bunches of small fruits that resemble wild grapes. The fruit is tough and has a hearty but bitter flavor. 암살자 포도나무 berries make a heady wine.

An 암살자 포도나무 can 이동 about, albeit very slowly, but usually stays put unless it needs to seek prey in a new vicinity.

These plants have thin, wiry stems and gray leaves shot through with silver, brown, and white veins so that they resemble mineral deposits.
